channel.title: Comments on: Kuri featured on CNBC
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Some of us think Kuri's a boy robot, while others here are confident Kuri is a girl. As long as nobody says "it" we're happy. :)
item.content:encoded: Some of us think Kuri’s a boy robot, while others here are confident Kuri is a girl. As long as nobody says “it” we’re happy. 🙂

item.title: By: Roger Barr
item.dc:creator: Roger Barr
item.description: You should not say "his ability to navigate" as Kuri is obviously a girl robot. She wears a skirt and speaks in a high pitched voice. She has learned from the founders and acts feminine. Please fix.
item.content:encoded: You should not say “his ability to navigate” as Kuri is obviously a girl robot. She wears a skirt and speaks in a high pitched voice. She has learned from the founders and acts feminine. Please fix.
